# stopStepCountingUpdates()

**Instance Method**

Stops the delivery of step-counting updates to your app.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopStepCountingUpdates()
```

## Discussion

Call this method to stop the delivery of updates that you started by calling the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMStepCounter/startStepCountingUpdates(to:updateOn:withHandler:)] method. This method does not stop queries started using the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMStepCounter/queryStepCountStarting(from:to:to:withHandler:)] method.

## Starting and Stopping Step Counting Updates

- **startStepCountingUpdates(to:updateOn:withHandler:)**: Starts the delivery of current step-counting data to your app.
- **CMStepUpdateHandler**: A block that reports the number of steps recorded since updates began.
